data.name: Repeat Demo
data.detailed_description:
Repeat is not an easy game, we recommend you try the demo. In it you will find a unique level that represents the core mechanics of the game. You can try for yourself how to play Repeat and at the same time check the hardware requirements. There are also three achievements for you to unlock.



Space, puzzle and what else? Solving the space-time puzzle is the core of the gameplay, but throughout the game you will be able to find out more about the collapse and the main heroine.



Think outside the box, and Repeat!
data.about_the_game:
Repeat is not an easy game, we recommend you try the demo. In it you will find a unique level that represents the core mechanics of the game. You can try for yourself how to play Repeat and at the same time check the hardware requirements. There are also three achievements for you to unlock.



Space, puzzle and what else? Solving the space-time puzzle is the core of the gameplay, but throughout the game you will be able to find out more about the collapse and the main heroine.



Think outside the box, and Repeat!
data.short_description: Repeat is an atmospheric first person game with spatial puzzles. Our main heroine has a small box that allows her to choose in which direction the space repeats. You solve the puzzles by moving and timing your actions just right. The sci-fi universe is at the verge of collapse. Can you stop it?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II x4 965 / Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670 / AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
